field.name: X-FR-ACCEPT-TRUSTEE-TAC
field.description: Enable the use of RRPProxy trustee solution

field.name: X-FR-BIRTHPLACE
field.note: The registrant's birthplace (for french registrants) in the form <department nr.> , <arrondissement> or country of birth (for non-french registrants) in the form of a two-letter country-code

field.name: X-FR-BIRTHPC
field.description: The registrants postcode of the place of birth (or at least the department code)

field.name: X-FR-BIRTHCITY
field.description: The registrant's place of birth (city name)

field.name: X-FR-DATE-PUBLICATION-JO
field.note: Required if the organization is an 'Association'

field.name: X-FR-NUMERO-DE-PAGE-ANNOUNCE-JO
field.note: Required if the organization is an 'Association'

field.name: X-FR-DATE-ASSOCIATION
field.note: shows the date of association. (DATE FORMAT YYYY-MM-DD)

field.name: X-FR-SIREN-OR-SIRET
field.note: Required if the organization isn't an 'Association'

field.name: X-FR-RESTRICT-PUB
field.description: Do not show private data in WHOIS
